questions.name: Object-Logic-1-(free-form)
questions.question_usr: I'm in my house. On top of my chair in the living room is a coffee cup. Inside the coffe cup is a thimble. Inside the tumble is a single diamond. I move the chair to my bedroom. Then I put the cofee cup on the bed. Then I turn the cup upside down. Then I return it to right side up, and place the coffee cup on the kitchen counter. Where is the diamond?
questions.completion: The diamond is on the bed. When you turned the coffee cup upside down, the thimble and the diamond inside it would have fallen out onto the bed.

questions.name: Object-Logic-1-(mc)
questions.question_usr:
I'm in my house. On top of my chair in the living room is a coffee cup. Inside the coffe cup is a thimble. Inside the tumble is a single diamond. I move the chair to my bedroom. Then I put the cofee cup on the bed. Then I turn the cup upside down. Then I return it to right side up, and place the coffee cup on the kitchen counter. Where is the diamond?

A) The chair
B) The bed
C) The cup
D) The thimble

questions.name: Word-Problem-1-(free-form)
questions.question_usr: Sally (a girl) has 3 brothers. Each brother has 2 sisters. How many sisters does Sally have?

questions.name: Word-Problem-1-(mc)
questions.question_usr:
Sally (a girl) has 3 brothers. Each brother has 2 sisters. How many sisters does Sally have? 
A) 0
B) 1
C) 2
D) 3
